item.title: Geoffrey Hinton Warns AI Will Replace 'Many, Many Jobs' By 2026 As Machines Learn To Deceive, Outsmart Humans
item.description: AI is advancing rapidly, replacing jobs and posing risks, but not enough effort is being put into mitigating those risks. read more

item.title: S&P 500 Edges Lower But Records Weekly Gain: Investor Sentiment Weakens, Fear Index Remains In 'Greed' Zone
item.description: CNN Money Fear and Greed index fell on Friday, but remained in the Greed zone. Stocks closed lower with S&P 500 up 1.4% for the week. read more

item.title: Bill Ackman Blasts Ro Khanna For Defending Billionaire Tax: 'Lost His Way'
item.description: Bill Ackman slams Ro Khanna for backing a California billionaire tax, saying the congressman "lost his way" on wealth policy. read more

item.title: NetEase, Nvidia And 3 Stocks To Watch Heading Into Monday
